resources.string: , you are able to create different projects to keep track of stitches and rows or rounds while knitting or crocheting. These projects are saved automatically when you leave the
and you can access them again later from the
. \n\nPress the floating plus button to create a new project and get ready to discover all of the wonderful features
Are you sure you want to reset the %1$s?
Tap here to open a new single counter. Use for quick projects that you don\'t need to track the progress of.

Tap here to open a new double counter. The double counter has two counters to keep track of your stitches and rows/rounds. The double counter will track your progress if you enter your total rows/rounds.
Tap here to update your project name.
Tap these buttons to change the number your counter increases/decreases by.
Tap the + and - buttons to increase or decrease the counter.
Tap the "Reset" button to reset your counter to 0.
Tap here to update your project name.
Tap these buttons to change the number your stitch counter increases/decreases by. The row counter has equivalent buttons.
Tap the + and - buttons to increase or decrease the row counter. The stitch counter has equivalent buttons.
Tap the "Reset" button to reset the stitch counter to 0. The row counter has an equivalent button.
Tap the "Reset" button to reset the row counter to 0. The stitch counter has an equivalent button.
Tap here to update total rows/rounds.
Here you can see the progress of your project if you\'ve enter total rows/rounds.
Tap here if you want to delete multiple projects at a time.
To delete a single project, press and hold a project to make a delete button appear.
